headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://cdn.lordicon.com; connect-src 'self' https://cdn.lordicon.com https://*.office.com https://*.microsoft.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https:; worker-src 'self' blob:; child-src 'self' blob:; frame-src https://*.office.com https://*.microsoft.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self';
